snippet: Senior officials are expressing concern that Russia might be moving to produce an arsenal of cruise missiles in violation of the landmark treaty on Intermediate-Range Nuclear Forces....
abstract: United States officials and lawmakers say Russia appears to be pushing forward with program to create ground-launched cruise missile despite protests on part of Obama administration that program would violate landmark Intermediate-Range Nuclear Forces arms control agreement.
lead_paragraph: Senior officials are expressing concern that Russia might be moving to produce an arsenal of cruise missiles in violation of the landmark treaty on Intermediate-Range Nuclear Forces.

headline.main: Russia Is Moving Ahead With Missile Program That Violates Treaty, U.S. Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Movement in Russian Missile Program Is Seen as Violation of Arms Treaty

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
